ProteinName	Upstream stimulatory factor 2 (Class B basic helix-loop-helix protein 12) (bHLHb12) (FOS-interacting protein) (FIP) (Major late transcription factor 2) (Upstream transcription factor 2)
GeneName	USF2 BHLHB12
Length	346
Function	Transcription factor that binds to a symmetrical DNA sequence (E-boxes) (5'-CACGTG-3') that is found in a variety of viral and cellular promoters.
